üì• Download bundle.min.js

üìã Implementation Guide

Step 1: Load required libraries in Webflow before the bundle:

<!-- GSAP Core + Plugins -->
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/gsap@3.12.5/dist/gsap.min.js"></script>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/gsap@3.12.5/dist/ScrollTrigger.min.js"></script>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/gsap@3.12.5/dist/Observer.min.js"></script>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/gsap@3.12.5/dist/Draggable.min.js"></script>
<script src="https://unpkg.com/split-type"></script>

<!-- Smooth Scroll -->
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/lenis@1.1.13/dist/lenis.min.js"></script>

<!-- D3.js -->
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/d3@7.9.0/dist/d3.min.js"></script>

<!-- imagesLoaded -->
<script src="https://unpkg.com/imagesloaded@5/imagesloaded.pkgd.min.js"></script>

Step 2: Add the bundle script after dependencies:

<script src="https://[YOUR-VERCEL-URL]/bundle.min.js"></script>

‚ö†Ô∏è Important: Load dependencies in order. The bundle will fail if libraries aren't available.
